3/ Developed a very mild cough on day 6, but by this point I'd already tried to go back to work!! I have since lost my sense of smell. Thought it was important to share as I'm sure many people like myself will feel the pressure to work when you feel like you've only had a

2/ managers would recognise atypical signs and encourage their staff to stay at home? I started with a very sudden onset of feeling like my sinuses were raw, as if I'd inhaled bleach. Two days feeling very tired, with headaches that I'd put down to a sinusitis. No fevers.
